# aap_eda_credential_type (Data Source)

Gets an existing EDA Credential Type.


## Example Usage

```terraform
# Look up an EDA Credential Type by name
data "aap_eda_credential_type" "example" {
  name = "my-credential-type"
}
```


<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the EDA Credential Type

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) EDA Credential Type id
- `url` (String) URL of the EDA Credential Type
